newsitem.title: USA: Finest Foodservice opening Boston Chicken stores.
newsitem.headline: Finest Foodservice opening Boston Chicken stores.

text.p: Finest Foodservice LLC, which owns and operates 64 Boston Market stores in seven Midwestern states, said Wednesday it will increase its development to 235 stores by the year 2003.
Finest Foodservice said this more than doubles its initial commitment to open 109 units.
Boston Market units are franchised by Boston Chicken Inc.
Finest Foodservice said it plans to open the stores in Minnesota, Kansas, North Dakota, South Dakota, Missouri, Nebraska and Iowa.

Finest Foodservice said its new units are part of Boston Chicken's nationwide development plan that calls for a total of approximately 3,600 Boston Market stores in the United States in the next five to seven years. Boston Chicken also has said it is evaluating international development.
There are currently 977 Boston Market stores in 37 states and Washington, D.C.
